title: 2,500 My Little Pony Friendship is Magic Wallpapers (Update)
description:
--MORE Torrentception--

This is the update to version 2.1.1 of this wallpaper collection from version 2.0. To view the full version of this collection, follow the link below.

[To be added]

To view the previous version of this collection (2.0), go here: http://thepiratebay.se/torrent/6913296/1_750_My_Little_Pony_Friendship_is_Magic_Wallpapers

______________________________________________

Here are 2,500 My Little Pony Friendship is Magic wallpapers, all hoof-selected by myself from multiple sources (Ponychan, DeviantArt, etc.).

Some information about the collection:
100% clear of duplicates (I've been through it several times, and even ran two separate programs that search for duplicate images)
100% have a res of 1366x768 or higher (and a large portion, perhaps even most, of these backgrounds are of 1920x1080 or higher)
All organised in multiple ways, for example: by character; by set (backgrounds that were clearly made together); and all in one folder together.

Also included in this collection are 9 multi-screen wallpapers and 139 wallpapers for the iPhone/iPod Touch, as well as two programs.

--All images in this collection are completely clean.--
(There is nothing unsafe for work, nor is there anything even close to borderline so.)

If you find any file that has been misorganised, duplicated, or is a wrong size, please make a comment.
Also, any comments/critiques about any aspect of this collection are much appreciated!


Enjoy and happy torrenting!



NOTE: For a while the seeding will be iffy, as my internet connection is a little wonky. A new router will arrive on Wednesday, and so I should have consistently great internet then. As it is, it's going to be slow.
